Alicia Trewhella Artist & Teacher

Alicia Trewhella

Painter and Music Teacher

Here is a timeline of Alicia Trewhella's Career:

  • 1984 - Moved to Dubai after teaching several years of music in Norwich, UK. Alicia found a music teaching position at JESS, Jumeirah English Speaking School Dubai.
  • 1990 - After teaching for a few years at JESS Alicia decided to start her own music teaching business. Where she taught all people from varius ages and backrounds. From local Emiraties, to European expat families, the persuit of musical learning and playing knows no nationality.
  • 1992 - Alicia and her partner Dermot, have their first child, Taylor.
  • 1994 - Alicia's seccond child Isabella is born.
  • 2000 - After several years in Dubai and due to certain circumstances Alicia and family had to move back to the UK to start a new life.
  • 2000 - Alicia proceeded to create a new music teaching and tutoring business in Oxfordshire. Where she acumilated over 100 pupils over the years.
  • 2010 - Moved to a fabulous home in the Cornish countryside with her new partner Edward Trewhella.
  • 2010 Onwards - Continued to teach a few pupils as well as persue her desire to paint.
  • Painting - Alicia has honed her skills in painting and sold many that have featured the beautiful Cornish countryside.

This is only a brief overview of a great women who continues to achieve greatness in her passion for teaching and painting.

If you have time please take a look at this link to learn more about Alicia Trewhella's paintings and music lessons.
